title: Improve spatial package.html to compare Strategys
description:
Spin off from LUCENE-4173.  One of the most important parts of using the spatial module is deciding which Strategy fits your needs.  We should improve the package.html documentation so that it compares the Strategys, focusing on:


	Underlying index format (lon/lat numeric fields vs grid terms vs ...)
	Multi-value support
	Indexable Shapes
	Queryable Shapes
	Query operations

comments.content:
I added some docs in trunk r1364782 (4x: 1364785)  This included SpatialExample.java

We now need to document the strategies.
